title: Prosciutto, mozzarella and basil stromboli
description: This is a really fantastic recipe for a kind of filled bread, a bit like a rolled-up pizza! It can also be made with ready-made pizza or bread dough and bought tomato pizza sauce.  We cooked this at Si’s sister’s family feast at her house near Florence.
ingredients: 450g/1lb strong white flour, plus extra for dusting
1 x 7g/¾oz sachet of fast-action dried yeast
2 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for greasing
good olive oil and balsamic vinegar
